com.radirius.mercury.framework

Class Runner.InitSetup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.mercury.framework.Runner.InitSetup
  • Enclosing class:
    Runner

    public static class Runner.InitSetup
extends java.lang.Object
    An object that will be used for initializing the Runner with default values that can be modified.

    • Field Summary
